resources:
Who Wants to be a Mirannaire
// Strings used for the title screen view rules Difficulty normal hard brutal maniac Who Wants To Be A Mirannaire Rules Each round contains ten multiple choice questions. Choose the right answer for each of them within the allotted time to win.\n\nChoosing a wrong answer or running out of time on a question will darken one of the circles at the top of the screen. When all three of them turn gray you will lose the round.\n\nTap of the difficulty of your choice to begin. Higher difficulties will naturally have harder questions, but they also have a higher score multiplier. Will you risk losing all of your circles for a chance at the high score?\n\nOh, and before I go, if you manage to reach the end with at least two of your circles intact, you\'ll receive a bonus question about yours truly for a chance at even more points!\n~ Campanella
// Normal questions and answers What\'s the last name of our ultra-dependable protagonist, Estelle?
Astray
Bright
Harvey
Rinz
Bright What\'s the first name of Estelle\'s late mother?
Hannah
Stella
Lena
Tabitha
Lena What\'s the name of harmonica-playing heartthrob Joshua\'s blood-related sister?
Estelle
Scherazard
Luciola
Karin
Karin What\'s the first name of softer-than-he-looks bracer Agate\'s late sister?
Millia
Mischa
Aisha
Tita
Mischa What is the color of \'Cuteness is justice!\' advocate Anelace\'s hair ribbon?
Yellow
Green
Red
Blue
Yellow What branch of the Bracer Guild is cuteness maniac Anelace attached to?
Rolent Branch
Ruan Branch
Grancel Branch
Bose Branch
Bose Branch What relation is Duke Dunan to Queen Alicia?
Her Brother
Her Son
Her Nephew
Her Retainer
Her Nephew What\'s the first name of Prince Olivert\'s father, the current reigning emperor of Erebonia?
Judis
Eugent
Rocksmith
Giliath
What\'s the name of the large lake situated in the center of Liberl?
Erebonia Lake
Ballerina Lake
Falleria Lake
Valleria Lake
What\'s the name of the vast area of woodland in the southeastern part of the Rolent region?
Mistwald
Mistforesta
Mistworld
Mistforet
What was the name that Captain Schwarz went by when disguised as a sister during the first game\'s finale?
Sister Ellen
Sister Rosa
Sister Frieda
Sister Noah
What did Estelle ask her parents for during the dream sequence in Second Chapter, Chapter 4?
Money
Strega\'s Latest Sneakers
A Sibling
A Harmonica
What\'s the name of hardcore sneaker collector Estelle\'s favorite brand?
Strega Corporation
Verne Company
Reinford Company
Liberl News Service
What\'s the name of the now-deceased father of Kilika, the woman in charge of Zeiss\' Bracer Guild branch?
Zin
Tact
Yakumo
Ryuga
What\'s the name of the Bracer Guild training facility situated in Leman State?
Le Locle
Liber Ark
Le Sage
Air-Letten
What\'s the name of black-haired darling Joshua\'s most-played harmonica song?
The Whereabouts of Freedom
The Whereabouts of Harmony
The Whereabouts of Light
The Whereabouts of Hope
What\'s the name of the huge drawbridge that connects the north and south sides of Ruan City?
Rembrandt Bridge
Deodorant Bridge
Langland Bridge
Giant Bridge
What\'s the name of the Aureole guardian which the party fight in the Sealed Area at the end of the first game?
Reverie
Revealer
Dreamer
Nightmare
What is depicted on the emblem of the Erebonian Empire?
Golden Cock
Golden Lion
Golden Hound
Golden Stallion
What was the name of the play performed at the festival held in Jenis Royal Academy in the first game, Chapter 2?
Mandolin of the White Magnolia
Madrigal of the White Magnolia
Minuet of the White Magnolia
Musette of the White Magnolia
// Hard questions and answers What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Bleublanc, the Phantom Thief?
No. X
No. XIII
No. XI
No. IX
What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Luciola, the Bewitching Bell?
No. V
No. VI
No. IV
No. VII
What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Walter, the Direwolf?
No. VII
No. IX
No. VIII
No. III
What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Renne, the Angel of Slaughter?
No. XIII
No. XIV
No. XVI
No. XV
What was the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Joshua, the Black Fang?
No. IX
No. XIII
No. VII
No. XII
What\'s the number of Ouroboros Enforcer Leonhardt, the Bladelord?
No. I
No. III
No. II
No. IV
What is the name of Princess Klaudia\'s late father?
Judis
Dunan
Edgar
Celeste
What was the name of Liberl\'s previous monarch before Queen Alicia took the throne?
Dunan
Celeste
Judis
Edgar
How many monarchs has Liberl had since its founding, including the current monarch, Queen Alicia?
25
26
27
28
Who has the dubious honor of being rejected by both Marsha in Grancel in the first game and Aina in Rolent in Second Chapter?
Ricky
Anton
Jimmy
Rinon
What is the name of the current president of Calvard?
Lucksmith
Rocksmith
Lecksmith
Rooksmith

Master Fisher
Amateur Fisher
Supreme Fisher
What is the name of the elder of the two twins who work in Edel Market in Grancel?
Kitty
Midee
Dadee

Alan, who works at Rolent\'s landing port, has a habit of rating every girl he sees. Which of the following earned 100 points?

Kloe
Estelle
Tita
What color is the Cecilia, one of the airships that transports people around Liberl?
Yellow
Blue
Red
Green
What color is the international airship, the Gretna, that connects Liberl and surrounding nations?
Yellow
Blue
Red
Green
What is the name of the state situated between Erebonia and Calvard that both countries assert ownership of?
Crossbell State
Ored State
Leman State
North Ambria State
What was the name of the expensive wine that Olivier drank at the Anterose in Chapter 1 of the first game?
Grand Chardonnay
Alan Richard
Grand Richard
Grand Sharia
What was the meaning of the name Leonhardt offered by Olivier when he encountered him in Second Chapter, Chapter 5?
Lion-faced
Lion-lover
Lion-crusher
Lion-hearted
What is the major of Jenis Royal Academy student Kloe Rinz?
Social Studies
Natural Sciences
Humanities
Science and Math
// Brutal questions and answers The Orbal Compatibility Tester at the festival in the first game shows the date on which sweet Estelle was born. When was it?
August 7th, 1186
September 14th, 1186
August 21st, 1186
July 7th, 1186
The Orbal Compatibility Tester at the festival in FC shows the date on which Joshua was born. When was it?
December 20th, 1185
December 10th, 1186
January 20th, 1185
January 10th, 1185
What is the combination to open the road lamp on the Milch Main Road in the quest given to you by Freddy in FC\'s prologue?
554818
545818
544818
544828
Which chapter of The Doll Knight was Bleublanc\'s second card hidden inside during the quest in Second Chapter, Chapter 3?
Chapter 13
Chapter 14
Chapter 15
Chapter 16
What is the name of the late husband of Matron Theresa, who runs Mercia Orphanage in Ruan?
George
James
Joseph
John
What is the name of famed angler and bearer of the Master Fisher rank Lloyd\'s niece?
Monika
Nikita
Reina
Thelma
How many dishes of Imperial cuisine is the head chef at Grancel Castle said to be able to make?
Over Ten
Over a Thousand
Over Ten Thousand
Over a Hundred
Which of the following pairs are not a couple?
Ellie and Armand
Louise and Ursus
Anton and Aina
Katrina and Finel
In the first game\'s Kitty-Talk for Dummies book, what does Nyayayaa～ mean?
Hold Up.
(An Expression of Delight)
(A Yawn)
Goodbye.
In the first game\'s Kitty-Talk for Dummies book, what does Nyaa mean?
These nails are bothering me.
I\'m hungry.
I\'m tired.
Yes, that\'s right.
How many Creepy Sheep take part in the race\'s ultimate technique, Sheep Asura Fuse?
Four
Five
Six
Seven
What\'s the nickname of Deen, the green-haired member of the Raven gang?
Broccoli Reaper
Parsley Tyrant
Spinach Fiend
Kelp Demon
There are a large number of different Pom enemies in the two previous games, but how many varieties are there in total?
Three
Four
Five
Six
Weissmann\'s S-Craft quote begins with, \'Can you feel it?\' but what does he say after that?
The agony…
The despair…
The desperation…
The pleasure…
Which of the following is the correct description for the Shadow Spear art?
A spear that whittles away life.
A sword that whittles away life.
A needle that whittles away life.
A blade that whittles away life.
Which of these is the beginning of the description for the orbal art Death Scream?
Shrill Screech
Piercing Cry
Harrowing Yell
Blood-Curdling Howl
What\'s the name of the quartz that makes enemies more likely to notice you?
Scent
Odor
Fragrance
Perfume
The Yin-Yang quartz combines the effects of which two others?
Heal and Ingenuity
Ingenuity and Septium Vein
Septium Vein and Haze
Haze and Heal
The quartz \'Heaven\'s Eye\' combines the effects of which two other quartz?
Haze and Range
Range and Eagle Eye
Eagle Eye and Information
Information and Haze
This question relates to Second Chapter. How many fishing spots are there in Liberl in total?
26
28
30
32
// Maniac questions and answers What is the origin of the name of Renne\'s S-Craft, Rennede?
Renne, Rend and End
Renne and Renegade
Renne, Need, and End
Renne, Rend and Tornado
What is the name of the vocal track that plays during the credits of FC?

Cry For Me, Cry For You
I Swear…

What is the name of the vocal track that plays during the credits of SC?
Silver Will, Golden Wings
Cry For Me, Cry For You
I Swear…
Whereabouts of Light

Brilliant Light of the Dark Land
Dazzling Light of the Hidden Land

Faint Light of the Forgotten Land
What is the name of the regular battle theme in FC?
Sophisticated Fight

Sophisticated Tight
Sophisticated Night
What is the name of the regular battle theme in SC?
Strawberry Fight
Strepitoso Fight
Strange Fight
Street Fight
What are the first two words of the SC opening vocal, Silver Will, Golden Wings?
Aoi tori
Aoi toki
Aoi sora
Aoi mori
One arge, a unit of length in the Trails series, is equivalent to how many real-world meters?"
1 meter
1,000 meters
10 meters
100 meters
One selge, a unit of length in the Trails series, is equivalent to how many real-world meters?
10 meters
100 meters
1,000 meters
10 kilometers
One rege, a unit of length in the Trails series, is equivalent to how many real-world meters?
1 meter
0.1 meters
0.001 meters
0.01 meters
One torim, a unit of weight in the Trails series, is equivalent to how many real world kilograms?
1 kilogram
10 kilograms
1000 kilograms
100 kilograms
What is the maximum mira you can have at once?
1,000,000,000 mira
999,999,999 mira
99,999,999 mira
9,999,999 mira
How many different loading screen animations are there in all in FC?
7
8
9
10

14
15
16
17
What is the maximum playtime that can be displayed on the Camp Menu?
199:59:59
299:59:59
399:59:59
499:59:59
What is the name of the Trails series\' currency?
Rose
Pia
Mira
Miro
Which of these is not part of the lyrics to Olivier\'s beloved tune, Amber Amour?
If this fleeting dream shall never be…
Our passionate first and final kiss…
And the cruel sun mocks my pain…
Let us immure this eternal love…
What is the name of the continent on which the Trails series takes place?
Eresia
Atlas
Zemuria
Afroca

Shielding Armor
Protecting Shield
Supporting Gauntlet
Rending Blade
Which of the following is not a statistic that appears in the game?
ATS (Arts Attack)
DEX (Dexterity)
MOV (Movement)
CHA (Charisma)
